price: 23. diggah nanu naynuwweeh nanu qidnaah baaxoo kee baaxo bagul tanim inkih nanu nagra mara kinnino.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
